features.Processor: Intel® Core™ i5-13420H (up to 4.6 GHz with Intel® Turbo Boost Technology, 12 MB L3 cache, 8 cores, 12 threads)
features.Wireless: Intel® Wi-Fi 6E AX211 (2x2) and Bluetooth® 5.3 wireless card (supporting gigabit data rate)
features.Audio: Audio by B&O; DTS:X® Ultra, Dual speakers, HP Audio Boost
features.USB-C Ports: 2 x SuperSpeed USB Type-C® 5Gbps signaling rate (DisplayPort™ 1.4, HP Sleep and Charge)
features.USB-A Ports: 4 x SuperSpeed USB Type-A 5Gbps signaling rate, 1 x USB Type-A 5Gbps signaling rate (HP Sleep and Charge)
